name: Google Sheets
semantic_context: Read, update and write data to Google Sheets
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Sheets  节点。主要用于: Read, update and write data to Google Sheets

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: sheet

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create

sheetId.name: sheetId
sheetId.description: The ID of the Google Spreadsheet. Found as part of the sheet URL https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/{ID}/.
sheetId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Spreadsheet ID | 作用: The ID of the Google Spreadsheet. Found as part of the sheet URL https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/{ID}/. | (必填项)

range.name: range
range.description: The table range to read from or to append data to. See the Google documentation for the details. If it contains multiple sheets it can also be added like this: "MySheet!A:F"
range.natural_language_description: 参数名: Range | 作用: The table range to read from or to append data to. See the Google documentation for the details. If it contains multiple sheets it can also be added like this: "MySheet!A:F" | 默认值: A:F | (必填项)

toDelete.name: toDelete
toDelete.description: Deletes columns and rows from a sheet
toDelete.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Delete | 作用: Deletes columns and rows from a sheet | 默认值: {}

rawData.name: rawData
rawData.description: Whether the data supplied is RAW instead of parsed into keys
rawData.natural_language_description: 参数名: RAW Data | 作用: Whether the data supplied is RAW instead of parsed into keys | 默认值: False

dataProperty.name: dataProperty
dataProperty.description: The name of the property from which to read the RAW data
dataProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Property | 作用: The name of the property from which to read the RAW data | 默认值: data

dataStartRow.name: dataStartRow
dataStartRow.description: Index of the first row which contains the actual data and not the keys. Starts with 0.
dataStartRow.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Start Row | 作用: Index of the first row which contains the actual data and not the keys. Starts with 0. | 默认值: 1

keyRow.name: keyRow
keyRow.description: Index of the row which contains the keys. Starts at 0. The incoming node data is matched to the keys for assignment. The matching is case sensitive.
keyRow.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key Row | 作用: Index of the row which contains the keys. Starts at 0. The incoming node data is matched to the keys for assignment. The matching is case sensitive. | 默认值: 0

lookupColumn.name: lookupColumn
lookupColumn.description: The name of the column in which to look for value
lookupColumn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lookup Column | 作用: The name of the column in which to look for value | (必填项)

lookupValue.name: lookupValue
lookupValue.description: The value to look for in column
lookupValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lookup Value | 作用: The value to look for in column

key.name: key
key.description: The name of the key to identify which data should be updated in the sheet
key.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key | 作用: The name of the key to identify which data should be updated in the sheet | 默认值: id

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: gridProperties (值: None) - The type of the sheet
hidden (值: None) - Whether the sheet is hidden in the UI, false if it's visible
rightToLeft (值: None) - Whether the sheet is an RTL sheet instead of an LTR sheet
sheetId (值: None) - The ID of the sheet. Must be non-negative. This field cannot be changed once set.
index (值: None) - The index of the sheet within the spreadsheet
tabColor (值: None) - The color of the tab in the UI

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The title of the spreadsheet

sheetsUi.name: sheetsUi
sheetsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sheets | 默认值: {}

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the sheet to delete
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sheet ID | 作用: The ID of the sheet to delete | (必填项)
